## VirtualListProxy.scrollTo() method

Scrolls the list to the specified offset in pixels

**Signature:**

```typescript
scrollTo(offset: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  offset | number | Offset to scroll to |

**Returns:**

void
